sentences.en: A Couple of drumsticks and one coleslaw, please.
sentences.cn: 请给我两双鸡腿,一份生菜沙拉.

sentences.en: All right. I'll have the fried chicken and coleslaw.
sentences.cn: 好吧. 我要吃炸鸡和生菜沙拉.

sentences.en: AMY: Fried chicken, coleslaw, carrots, celery, rolls, wine.
sentences.cn: 艾米: 炸鸡, 凉拌卷心菜, 胡萝卜, 芹菜, 面包圈, 葡萄酒.

sentences.en: Coleslaw is a kind of salad made of finely chopped cabbage and mayonnaise.
sentences.cn: 克思罗沙拉是用切碎的圆白菜和蛋黄酱做成的.

sentences.en: There's tuna fish for sandwiches and you'll find coleslaw in the fridge.
sentences.cn: 有鲔鱼叁明治给你冰箱里还有凉拌卷心菜.

sentences.en: Uncooked cabbage , cut sim thinly, is using used in coleslaw and other salarssalads.
sentences.cn: 生卷心菜, 切成细丝, 可以用来做卷心菜沙拉或其它的沙拉.

sentences.en: Urban Pantry also sells biscotti, zucchini pickles, coleslaw and garlic-marinated sweet red peppers.
sentences.cn: 此外还出售意大利脆饼、西葫芦腌菜、凉拌卷心菜丝和蒜香甜红椒。

sentences.en: When you make coleslaw or potato salad, use light or non-fat mayonnaise.
sentences.cn: 当你做凉拌卷心菜或者土豆沙拉，用低或者无脂的蛋黄酱。

trans.tran_cn: 卷心菜色拉，酸洋白菜丝，（凉拌）卷心菜丝
trans.tran_en: a  salad  made with thinly cut raw  cabbage
